title: TV Button - Portrait
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and the device is in Portrait
custom_steps:
When the user launches an MLB.TV stream
and taps the TV button
custom_expected:
Then an audio feed picker will display as a menu on the bottom of the screen
and will include a "Done" button in the top right of the menu

title: TV Button - Landscape
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and the device is in Landscape
custom_steps:
When the user launches an MLB.TV stream
and taps the TV button
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed picker will display across the whole screen
and the "Done" button will be visible and accessible

title: Audio Feed Picker Display
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
custom_steps:
When the user launches an MLB.TV stream
and taps the TV button to display the audio feed picker
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:
	
Titled "Select Feeds"
Separated into two categories: Video Feed, Audio Feed
Video Feed section will list: Away team's feed (top), Home team's feed (bottom)
Audio Feed section will list only one team's audio options (that whose TV feed is currently playing): TV audio, English Radio audio, Spanish radio audio (if available)

title: Audio Feed Picker - Current Audio
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
custom_steps:
When the user launches an MLB.TV stream
and taps the TV button to display the audio feed picker
custom_expected:
The user will see two button indicators for which audio is currently playing:

one for the video feed
one for the audio feed

title: Audio Feed Picker - Switching Audio (Radio)
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
custom_steps:
When the user launches an MLB.TV stream
and taps the TV button to display the audio feed picker
and picks another audio feed option (Radio)
custom_expected:
Then the TV stream will remain the same,
and the audio will switch over to the Radio audio feed,
and the button indicator will update to reflect the new option

title: Audio Feed Picker - Switching Audio (Video)
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
custom_steps:
When the user launches an MLB.TV stream
and taps the TV button to display the audio feed picker
and picks another audio feed option (Video)
custom_expected:
Then the user will go through media framework checks,
and will be switched over to the other video feed

title: Audio Feed Picker - New Feed
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
custom_steps: When the user has switched to another video feed via the audio feed picker
custom_expected: Then the user can tap the TV button to bring up the audio feed picker again

title: Audio Feed Picker - New Feed Options
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and the user has switched to another video feed via the audio feed picker
custom_steps: When the user taps the TV button to view the audio feed picker
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the same Video Feed options (away/home),
but will see different TV and Radio Audio Feed options, specific to the team whose TV feed is playing

title: Audio Feed Picker - Done Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and the user is viewing the audio feed picker
custom_steps: When the user taps the Done button
custom_expected: Then the feed picker will be dismissed

title: Audio Feed Picker - Spanish user
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and the device language is set to Spanish
custom_steps: When the user launches an MLB.TV feed of a team that also has a Spanish MLB Audio feed available
custom_expected:
Then the default audio when the TV feed launches will be the Spanish Audio feed
and it will be marked as such in the Audio Feed picker

title: Local Blackout
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there are live feeds available
custom_steps:
When there is a live feed up for a team in which the user is located in their market
and the user tries to launch the feed

(i.e. Mets or Yankees have a live feed, user is located in New York)
custom_expected: Then the user will receive a 'Blackout Restriction' message and the feed will NOT play

title: National Blackout
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there are live feeds available
custom_steps:
When there is a live feed up for a game that is designated as a national blackout
and the user is located in the United States
and the user tries to launch the feed

(i.e. ESPN Sunday night game)
custom_expected: Then the user will receive a 'Blackout Restriction' message and the feed will NOT play

title: Local Blackout - Free Game
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there are live feeds available
custom_steps:
When there is a live feed up for a team in which the user is located in their market
and the game is designated "Free Game of the Day"
and the user tries to launch the feed

(i.e. Mets or Yankees have a live feed, user is located in New York)
custom_expected: Then the user will receive a 'Blackout Restriction' message and the feed will NOT play

title: Free User - Not Logged In - Upsell
custom_preconds:
Given the user is a free user
who is not logged in
custom_steps: When the user launches the MLB.TV EPG
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV EPG will appear and display the Subscribe to MLB.TV up-sell ad

title: Free User - Not Logged In - Tapping Upsell
custom_preconds:
Given the user is a free user
and the user is not logged in
and the user is viewing the MLB.TV EPG
custom_steps: When the user taps the MLB.TV upsell from the MLB.TV EPG
custom_expected: Then the TV paywall will appear

title: Logging in from TV Paywall
custom_preconds:
Given the user is a free user
and the user is not logged in
custom_steps:
When the user taps the MLB.TV upsell from the MLB.TV EPG
and taps to Sign in with an MLB account
and logs in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
custom_expected: Then the paywall will dismiss and the user will receive a "Successful" prompt

title: Free User - Logged In - Upsell
custom_preconds:
Given the user is a free user
who is logged in
custom_steps: When the user launches the MLB.TV EPG
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV EPG will appear and display the Subscribe to MLB.TV up-sell ad

title: Free User - Logged In - Tapping Upsell
custom_preconds:
Given the user is a free user
and the user is logged in
and the user is viewing the MLB.TV EPG
custom_steps: When the user taps the MLB.TV upsell from the MLB.TV EPG
custom_expected: Then the TV paywall will appear

title: TV Monthly User
custom_preconds: Given the user has logged in with a TV Monthly account
custom_steps: When the user launches an MLB.TV feed
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV feed will begin to play successfully

title: TV Yearly User
custom_preconds: Given the user has logged in with a TV Yearly account
custom_steps: When the user launches an MLB.TV feed
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV feed will begin to play successfully

title: Logging in from Settings
custom_preconds: Given the user has the app installed
custom_steps:
When a user logs in through More > Settings > MLB Account with a valid MLB.TV account
and tries to launch an MLB.TV feed
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV feed will play successfully

title: MLB Audio User - MLB.TV Feed
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an account that is only entitled for MLB Audio
custom_steps: When the user tries to launch an MLB.TV feed
custom_expected: Then the user will be prompted with the MLB.TV paywall

title: MLB Audio User - Free Game of the Day
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an account that is only entitled for MLB Audio
custom_steps: When the user tries to launch a Free Game of the Day feed
custom_expected: Then the Free Game of the Day feed will play successfully

title: Free User - Not Logged In - Free Game
custom_preconds:
Given the user is a free user
who is not logged in
custom_steps: When the user tries to launch a Free Game of the Day feed
custom_expected: Then the user will be prompted by the Login/Register screen

title: Free User - Free Game - Logging In
custom_preconds:
Given the user is a free user
who is not logged in
custom_steps:
When the user tries to launch a Free Game of the Day feed
and then logs in or creates an account from the Login/Register screen
custom_expected: Then the Free Game of the Day feed will play successfully

title: Free User - Logged In - Free Game
custom_preconds:
Given the user is a free user
who is logged in
custom_steps: When the user tries to launch a Free Game of the Day feed
custom_expected: Then the Free Game of the Day feed will play successfully

title: Fresh Install
custom_preconds:
Given the user has fresh installed the app
and is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
custom_steps: When a user attempts to start up a MLB.TV Stream
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV Stream begins to play successfully

title: Upgrading from Past Build
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed an older version of the app
and upgrades to the newer version
and is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
custom_steps: When a user attempts to start up a MLB.TV Stream
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV Stream begins to play successfully

title: WiFi Connection
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
custom_steps: When a user is on WIFI connection and attempts to start up a MLB.TV Stream
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV Stream begins to play successfully

title: Cellular Connection
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
custom_steps: When a user is on cellular connection and attempts to start up a MLB.TV Stream
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV Stream begins to play successfully

title: User Receives Call
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
custom_steps:
When a user is viewing an MLB.TV streams
and receives a call during
custom_expected:
Then the MLB.TV Stream will pause
and the user is able to answer the call successfully

title: User Receives a Text
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
custom_steps:
When a user is viewing an MLB.TV stream
and receives a text message
custom_expected:
Then the MLB.TV Stream will continue to play
and we will receive the Text Message successfully

title: Rotating from Portrait to Landscape
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and the user is streaming an MLB.TV feed while the device is in Portrait
custom_steps: When a user rotates the device to landscape mode
custom_expected:
Then the MLB.TV Stream will rotate from portrait to landscape
and the app will not crash

title: Rotating from Landscape to Portrait
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and the user is streaming an MLB.TV feed while the device is in Landscape
custom_steps: When a user rotates the device to portrait mode
custom_expected:
Then the MLB.TV Stream will rotate from landscape to portrait
and the app will not crash

title: Tapping X Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and the user is streaming an MLB.TV feed
custom_steps: When the user taps the X button
custom_expected:
Then the media player will close down
and the user will be left on the previous screen

title: Enabling Closed Captioning
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and the user is streaming an MLB.TV feed
custom_steps: When the user taps to enable Closed Captioning
custom_expected: Then closed captioning will display on the MLB.TV stream

title: Disabling Closed Captioning
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and the user is streaming an MLB.TV feed
and the user has previously enabled Closed Captioning
custom_steps: When the user taps to disable Closed Captioning
custom_expected: Then closed captioning will no longer display on the MLB.TV stream

title: CC Setting Carryover
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and the user is streaming an MLB.TV feed
and the user has enabled Closed Captioning
custom_steps:
When the user dismisses the video player
and then launches another MLB.TV stream
custom_expected:
Then closed captioning will display on the MLB.tv stream
and the CC button will be in an On state

title: Live MLB.TV Playback
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is a live feed available
custom_steps: When a user launches a Live MLB.TV feed
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

Red scrubber
LIVE indicator to right of scrubber
Increasing duration time to the left of scrubber

title: Live MLB.TV Playback Controls - Portrait
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is a live feed available
custom_steps:
When a user launches a Live MLB.TV feed
and the device is in Portrait
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

Rewind 30, Pause, and Forward 30 buttons below scrubber
Overlay button on bottom left
Closed Caption button on bottom right

title: Live MLB.TV Playback Controls - Landscape
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is a live feed available
custom_steps:
When a user launches a Live MLB.TV feed
and the device is in Landscape
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

Rewind 30, Pause, and Forward 30 buttons to the left of scrubber
Overlay and Closed Caption buttons to the right of scrubber

title: Live MLB.TV - Rewind Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is a live feed available
custom_steps:
When a user launches a Live MLB.TV feed
and the user taps the Rewind 30 button
custom_expected: Then the stream will rewind 30 seconds

title: Live MLB.TV - Fast Forward Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is a live feed available
custom_steps:
When a user launches a Live MLB.TV feed
and the user rewinds the feed
and the user taps the Forward 30 button
custom_expected: Then the stream will fast forward 30 seconds

title: Live MLB.TV - Scrubber when Rewound
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is a live feed available
custom_steps:
When a user launches a Live MLB.TV feed
and the user rewinds the feed
custom_expected:
Then the scrubber color will change from red to white
and the Live text will become a tappable button

title: Live MLB.TV - Live Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is a live feed available
custom_steps:
When a user launches a Live MLB.TV feed
and the user rewinds the feed
and taps the Live button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be caught up to the current Live point in the stream
and the scrubber color will return to red

title: Live MLB.TV - FF Button while Live
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is a live feed available
custom_steps: When the user is viewing a stream at its Live point
custom_expected: Then the Forward 30 button will be disabled

title: Live MLB.TV - Scrubber
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is a live feed available
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing a live feed
and manually drags the scrubber
custom_expected: Then the stream will play from whichever point the scrubber was dragged to

title: Live MLB.TV - Scrubber when Rotating
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is a live feed available
custom_steps:
When the user rotates the device
(check from Portrait to Landscape, Landscape to Portrait)
custom_expected: Then the scrubber and other content will display correctly, regardless of the device's orientation

title: Live MLB.TV - Mute Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is a live feed available
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing a live feed
and taps the mute button
custom_expected: Then the stream will be muted

title: Live MLB.TV - Mute Button when Muted
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is a live feed available
custom_steps:
When the user has muted the stream
and then taps the mute button
custom_expected:
Then the stream's audio will return
and will no longer be muted

title: Live MLB.TV - Picture-in-Picture (Backgrounding App)
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed on an iPhone 
and has Picture-in-Picture enabled in the device Settings
and is logged in to the MLB app with an entitled account
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing a live MLB.TV feed
and backgrounds the app
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV feed should continue to play in picture in picture

title: MLB.TV Archive Playback
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an archive feed available
custom_steps: When a user launches an MLB.TV archive feed
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

White scrubber
Increasing duration time to the left of scrubber
Decreasing duration time to the right of scrubber

custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an archive feed available
custom_steps:
When a user launches an MLB.TV archive feed
and the device is in Portrait
custom_expected:

custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an archive feed available
custom_steps:
When a user launches an MLB.TV archive feed
and the device is in Landscape
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

Rewind 30, Pause, and Forward 30 buttons to the left of scrubber
Overlay and Closed Caption buttons to the right of scrubber

title: MLB.TV Archive - Rewind Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an MLB.TV archive feed available
custom_steps:
When a user launches an MLB.TV archive
and the user taps the Rewind 30 button
custom_expected: Then the stream will rewind 30 seconds

title: MLB.TV Archive - Fast Forward Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an MLB.TV archive feed available
custom_steps:
When a user launches an archive feed
and the user rewinds the feed
and the user taps the Forward 30 button
custom_expected: Then the stream will fast forward 30 seconds

custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an MLB.TV archive feed available
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing an archive feed 
and manually drags the scrubber
custom_expected: Then the stream will play from whichever point the scrubber was dragged to

title: MLB.TV Archive - Scrubber when Rotating
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an MLB.TV archive feed available
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing an archive feed
and rotates the device
(check from Portrait to Landscape, Landscape to Portrait)
custom_expected: Then the scrubber and other content will display correctly, regardless of the device's orientation

title: MLB.TV Archive - Mute Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an MLB.TV archive feed available
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing an archive feed
and taps the mute button
custom_expected: Then the stream will be muted

title: MLB.TV Archive - Mute Button when Muted
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an MLB.TV archive feed available
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing an archive feed
and has muted the stream
and then taps the mute button
custom_expected:
Then the stream's audio will return
and will no longer be muted

title: MLB.TV Archive - Picture-in-Picture (Backgrounding App)
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed on an iPhone and has Picture-in-Picture enabled in the device Settings
and is logged in to the MLB app with an entitled account
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing an MLB.TV archive
and backgrounds the app
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV feed should continue to play in picture in picture

title: CC Setting Carryover
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
AND the user navigates to settings
AND the user has enables Closed Captioning in the Accessibility section
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a game
AND then launches another MLB.TV stream
custom_expected:
THEN closed captioning will display on the MLB.tv stream
AND the CC button will be in an On state

and the device is in Portrait
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

Rewind 30, Pause, and Forward 30 buttons to the left of scrubber
Overlay and Closed Caption buttons to the right of scrubber

title: MLB.TV Archive Playback Controls - Landscape
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an archive feed available
custom_steps:
When a user launches an MLB.TV archive feed
and the device is in Landscape
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

Rewind 30, Pause, and Forward 30 buttons to the left of scrubber
Overlay and Closed Caption buttons to the right of scrubber

title: MLB.TV Archive - Rewind Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an MLB.TV archive feed available
custom_steps:
When a user launches an MLB.TV archive
and the user taps the Rewind 30 button
custom_expected: Then the stream will rewind 30 seconds

title: MLB.TV Archive - Fast Forward Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an MLB.TV archive feed available
custom_steps:
When a user launches an archive feed
and the user rewinds the feed
and the user taps the Forward 30 button
custom_expected: Then the stream will fast forward 30 seconds

title: MLB.TV Archive - Scrubber
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an MLB.TV archive feed available
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing an archive feed 
and manually drags the scrubber
custom_expected: Then the stream will play from whichever point the scrubber was dragged to

title: MLB.TV Archive - Scrubber when Rotating
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an MLB.TV archive feed available
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing an archive feed
and rotates the device
(check from Portrait to Landscape, Landscape to Portrait)
custom_expected: Then the scrubber and other content will display correctly, regardless of the device's orientation

title: MLB.TV Archive - Mute Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an MLB.TV archive feed available
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing an archive feed
and taps the mute button
custom_expected: Then the stream will be muted

title: MLB.TV Archive - Mute Button when Muted
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an account entitled for MLB.TV
and there is an MLB.TV archive feed available
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing an archive feed
and has muted the stream
and then taps the mute button
custom_expected:
Then the stream's audio will return
and will no longer be muted

title: MLB.TV Archive - Picture-in-Picture (Backgrounding App)
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed on an iPad that supports Picture-in-Picture
and has Picture-in-Picture enabled in the device Settings
and is logged in to the MLB app with an entitled account
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing an MLB.TV archive
and backgrounds the app
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV feed should continue to play in picture in picture

title: Tapping TV Icon ("Watch" tab in bottom nav)
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed on the user's device
custom_steps: When a user taps on the "Watch" tab from the bottom navigation bar
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV EPG will appear

title: Tapping Game Tile
custom_preconds: Given MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When a user taps on the TV icon 
And
When a feed(s) is active for a particular game
and 
the user taps the game tile
custom_expected: Then the game will launch with the home team's feed OR the feed of your favorite or followed team
